Description.Text:
Punch Line
A fabulous setting for your dream holiday!
Business during the day and city excitement at night awaits your arrival
Close to major attractions and city excitement, we invite you to be our guest
Experience the local culture and attractions of this beautiful location.
Policies
Please be advised there is a fee for early departures.
3 star accommodations A melting pot of cultures and religions. Affordable accommodations Beautiful views and exceptional service City views and exceptional service Perfect for weekend getaway
